title: SPA ALKA+
long_description: SPA ALKA +Â prevents fluctuations in pH and helps to keep spa water perfectly balanced to optimize the efficiency of sanitizers. Maintaining balanced alkalinity will also improve bather comfort and protect spa equipment.
short_description: BENEFITS Helps maintain a balanced pH Improves bather comfort FORMAT 1 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: The recommended alkalinity level is 80 to 120 ppm for chlorine sanitizers and 100 to 150 ppm for bromine sanitizers. Check alkalinity levels every two weeks with a test kit and adjust as needed.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Sprinkle SPA ALKA + over the surface of the spa water.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Adjust alkalinity level as needed according to application method and recommended dosage. Wait 20 minutes before bathing.

dosage.specifications: To increase total alkalinity by 10 ppm: Add 16 g of SPA ALKA + per 1,000 L of spa water.

warning: DO NOT apply the product when people are in the spa.
